data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended On 31.03.2022
data.news_body: Sir/Madam,Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the SEBI Listing Regulations, please find enclosed herewith disclosures of related party transactions in the format, as prescribed by SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662dated 22 November 2021, for the half year ended on 31 March2022.We have already upload the XBRL filing with the BSE on 30th April 2022 but that was in Old Utility. The acknowledgement for the same filing is hereby attached with this letter.Further on 28th April we have upload the related party transaction on BSE portal in new format as prescribed by the SEBI. The acknowledgement for the same filing is hereby attached with this letter.

data.news_body: Audited Results of S. E. Power Limited for the quarter ended 31.03.2022 and year ended 31.03.2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 24Th January, 2022
data.news_body:
With reference to our intimation letter dated January 17, 2022 regarding Board Meeting, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on January 24, 2022 has inter alia:

The Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) with the Limited Review Report for the Quarter ended December 31, 2021. Copy of the same is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Standalone And Consolidated Cash Flow Statements For The Quarter Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to your mail dated 11th November 2021 regarding submission of Standalone and Consolidated Cash Flow for the Quarter ended September 30, 2021.

The Standalone and Consolidated Cash Flow for the Quarter ended September 30, 2021. Copy of the same is enclosed herewith.

data.news_body: Outcome of Board Meeting regarding Unaudited Results for the quarter ended 30th September 2021

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Period Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 -Disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the period ended March 31, 2021

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Along With Copy Of Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31.03.2021
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in its meeting held on 18.06.2021 has approved the financial results of the company for the Quarter and Year ended 31.032021
